welcome_message_body: Welcome to Champigny-sur-Marne, a charming city known for its picturesque riverside views and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mostly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow and unreliable.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals (2A to 2G) serving a mix of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for up to 4 hours, after which a fee will apply.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport.
